text: Debra Stephenson (born 4 June 1972) is an English actress, comedian, impressionist and singer. She is best known for portraying the roles of Shell Dockley in the ITV prison-based drama series Bad Girls (1999–2001, 2003), and Frankie Baldwin in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (2004–2006). ==Early life== Stephenson was born and raised in Kingston upon Hull. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English comedians Category:People from Kingston upon Hull Category:Actors from Yorkshire
title: Debra Stephenson
